name: Stickman War: Fighting Games
description:
Are you ready to be a part of an ultimate stickman action fight? This game has got your craving for an action covered, so download now and start playing.


This MOBA game will let you become a world-fighting superstar. It is a multiplayer game that allows you to play with different players. Get your Mugen karate fighting journey started now. Your inner samurai and PRO karate champion moves will help you defeat the biggest martial arts-trained fighters in this game. It does not matter if they excel at taekwondo or ninja fighting skills like Muay Thai, because you are the real superhero of the stickman fighting.


Plan a strategy and defeat your opponents accordingly. Fight like the king boxing champion that you are. Use your expert boxing and wrestling techniques to guide your rivals to their victory. Pick an avatar player of your own choice. Select a fighting area on the map and the next area will be opened when you complete the first one. You can also watch videos to unlock new levels. Just get yourself started in this action fighting battle, the game itself will do the rest to keep you engaged.


Get free spins and daily rewards and gather coins to upgrade the strengths of players and unlock new ones. Throw extreme punches and boxing moves at your enemies so that they don’t stand a chance against you. Complete missions to get more rewards. Double your rewards for completing a level by watching a video.


This game is specially designed for fighting game lovers. This will give you extreme action displays and amazing martial arts fighting moves that would be stunned. The intuitive touch controls and awesomely designed game characters and graphics will have you amazed. The jaw-dropping environment and effects will keep you engaged in the game. The game has 3 different modes: knockout mode, level by level, and a special multiplayer mode. This mode allows you to play with random players online. The background music will keep your ear pleased while you are engaged in an intense punch boxing fight. Play this game with your friends and compare scores to have fun and become a trained fighter champion.


Stickman War: Fighting Games Features:

-Player selection option available to give a personalized experience.
-Get daily rewards and free spins to gather more coins and gifts.
-Awesomely designed 3D graphics and amazing background environment.
-Ear catching background music will keep you engaged in the game till the end.
-Three different and interesting game modes: Knockout, Level by level, and multiplayer mode.
-High-Quality graphics and smooth gameplay to get a hold of the game
